title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Social Studies Design for Students with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social phenomena and experience in simple data analysis
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can decompose real-world social problems into three-tiered questions with teacher support.
Learners can classify key evidence with 80% accuracy after mastering the use of structured inquiry worksheets.
Learners can generate simple data visualization charts using digital tools (tablets/apps).
Learners can summarize inquiry results in a 5-minute oral presentation based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
